mapper.insert: insert into driver_info (id, name, phone, sex, plate_no, company, drive_type, address, birth, nation, on_job, deltag, companyId) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onJob,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deltag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update driver_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plate_no = #{plateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drive_type = #{driveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, on_job = #{onJob,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deltag = #{deltag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyId = #{companyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, name, phone, sex, plate_no, company, drive_type, address, birth, nation, on_job, deltag, companyId from driver_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, name, phone, sex, plate_no, company, drive_type, address, birth, nation, on_job, deltag, companyId from driver_info
